sentences.en: All power is vested in, and consequently derived from, the people.
sentences.cn: 所有的权力都属于人民, 因此也来自人民.

sentences.en: Consequently he threw Carrie into repression, which was irritating.
sentences.cn: 嘉莉的心里话得不到倾吐,感到受了压抑, 心里很不痛快.

sentences.en: Consequently, even as the blogosphere continues to expand, only a few blogs are likely to emerge as focal points.
sentences.cn: 结果，尽管博客圈继续扩大，但仅有少数的博客有可能脱颖而出，成为关注的焦点。

sentences.en: Consequently, radiometric dating has advanced briskly in the past 30 years.
sentences.cn: 因此, 新近三十年来,放射性计时迅猛发展.

sentences.en: Consequently, the current passes along the fish from head to tail.
sentences.cn: 这样, 电流便不断地经全身,由头至尾流动.

sentences.en: Consequently, they are binding on both the agency and the private party.
sentences.cn: 所以, 宣告性裁决对行政机关和私人当事人均有约束力.

sentences.en: Grandfather Dingsdale had sustained a broken back while working in the mines. Consequently, he spent the rest of his life in a wheelchair.
sentences.cn: 丁斯戴尔爷爷在矿井里工作时被压断了脊骨，结果，下半辈子都与轮椅为伴了。

sentences.en: It was a gory day . Consequently it was an extremely satisfactory one.
sentences.cn: 这是一场血淋淋的战争,因此也是个痛快淋漓的日子.

sentences.en: Most computer users have never received any formal keyboard training. Consequently, their keyboard skills are inefficient.
sentences.cn: 大多数的电脑使用者都没有经过正规的键盘操作训练，因此他们的键盘技巧不够熟练。

sentences.en: My mother had consequently made her own shrewd deductions about what was going on in my marriage.
sentences.cn: 我母亲已据此对我的婚姻状况作出了她自己精明的推断。

sentences.en: Relations between the two companies had, consequently, never been close.
sentences.cn: 因此，两家公司之间的关系一直都不太亲密。

sentences.en: The company went bankrupt and consequently he lost his job.
sentences.cn: 公司破产，因此他失业了。

sentences.en: The general consequently promised to withdraw his troops speedily from Mexico.
sentences.cn: 将军最终答应将军队快速撤离墨西哥.

sentences.en: The molecules are absorbed into the bloodstream and consequently affect the organs.
sentences.cn: 这些分子被吸收到血液里，从而影响到器官。

sentences.en: They had children and were consequently tied to the school holidays.
sentences.cn: 他们有孩子，当然就受学校假期的束缚。

sentences.en: This poses a threat to agriculture and the food chain, and consequently to human health.
sentences.cn: 这会对农业和食物链造成威胁，由此而危及人的健康。

sentences.en: Whom , therefore, we also like, and Who, consequently, is good. "
sentences.cn: 因此, 我们也喜欢这位神, 所以这位神是善的. ”

words.tran_cn: 随之发生的；作为结果的
间接的；结果的；重要的；随之发生的；自傲的
